compute_lzone¶

StructureSimilarity.compute_lzone(save_file=True, filename=None)[source]¶

Compute the zone for L-RMSD calculation.

Note

It only provides the zone of long chain(s) which is used for fitting. The zone used for calculating RMSD is defined in the function compute_lrmsd_fast.

Parameters

  • save_file (bool, optional) – save the zone file

  • filename (str, optional) – name of the file

Returns

dict – definition of the zone.

Previous topic

compute_lrmsd_pdb2sql

Next topic

compute_fnat_fast
